channel.title: Economy
channel.description: News, Analysis and Opinion from POLITICO

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump acknowledges the crowd after speaking during an event at the Horizon Events Center in Clive, Iowa, Jan. 27, 2026.

item.dc:creator: By Megan Messerly

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump has struggled to stay on message, and even Republicans say he hasn’t necessarily delivered on the economy.

item.dc:creator: By Gregory Svirnovskiy

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

media:content.media:credit: Tom Brenner/The New York Times via AP
media:content.media:title: Vice President JD Vance delivers remarks at Uline Inc. in Allentown, Pennsylvania, on Tuesday.

item.dc:creator: By Irie Sentner, Alex Gangitano and Eli Stokols
item.dc:contributor: By Irie Sentner, Alex Gangitano and Eli Stokols

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, according to focus groups conducted by a Democratic pollster and obtained by POLITICO.

media:content.media:title: Democrat Abigail Spanberger points at the crowd after she was declared the winner of the Virginia governor's race during an election night watch party this month in Richmond, Virginia.

item.dc:creator: By Elena Schneider

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

media:content.media:title: Eileen Higgins celebrates at a watch party after winning the Miami mayoral runoff election, Dec. 9, 2025.

item.dc:creator: By Kimberly Leonard, Madison Fernandez and Joe Anuta
item.dc:contributor: By Kimberly Leonard, Madison Fernandez and Joe Anuta

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

media:content.media:title: President Donald Trump takes part in a roundtable discussion in the Roosevelt Room of the White House in Washington on Dec. 10, 2025.

item.dc:creator: By Gregory Svirnovskiy
